Articles.Content:
At this point all our ships are in one directory. Once you have built a lot of ships, this list becomes pretty hard to read. It would be great to have folder structures so it is easier to categorize our vessels.

It would also be nice if the notes that we can write for our vessels in the VAB, could be read out in this list. I have a lot of different ships:

e.g.

StationCore Mk1

StationCore Mk2

StationCore Mk3

etc.

All of them serve a different purpose, but after playing for a while I'm not sure what vessel does what. I use the notes in the VAB for this, but to actually read them I have to load my ship in the VAB. It would be a lot more convenient if those notes were displayed in the screen you get when you click on the launchpad and select your vessel instead of loading each separate craft in the VAB to see what it does.
This is a good idea I would love to be able to place my created craft in folders just for organization purposes

Yea being able to add all my first rockets into on folder, my newer rockets into another and my crazy test into another folder would be great. I end up naming my ships Crow MK1, then MK2 so they all just clump up in the alphabetical list. The crazy MK1 however is always near the top of the list despite being made 3 months ago or something.

Personally, I'd love to be able to organize my designs by folders. Good thing we already have a separate one for launch vehicles (I mean subassembly "folder"). But yeah, a simple set of OS-based commands to create folders and put designs in those from within the game would be great.
